article_title: Target Faces Nearly 70 Lawsuits Over Breach
article_text: Companies, investors and regulators recognize the importance of an effective board of directors, with an ever-greater emphasis placed on board structure, composition and refreshment. Beyond the need for a variety of skills and experience, establishing a vital mix of personality traits can also be an important consideration, as this can greatly impact the board’s effectiveness. Interacting with diverse personalities comes with the territory, but how well directors relate to conflicting personalities can mean the difference between collegial and respectful interactions—or clashes of opinions that stifle creative thinking.

twitter.description: Data breaches are a powerful magnet for class action suits, which can sting a company’s reputation for years to come.
twitter.title: Target Faces Nearly 70 Lawsuits Over Breach

article_summary:
Companies, investors and regulators recognize the importance of an effective board of directors, with an ever-greater emphasis placed on board structure, composition and refreshment.
Interacting with diverse personalities comes with the territory, but how well directors relate to conflicting personalities can mean the difference between collegial and respectful interactions—or clashes of opinions that stifle creative thinking.
Beyond the need for a variety of skills and experience, establishing a vital mix of personality traits can also be an important consideration, as this can greatly impact the board’s effectiveness.
